participant_1.background:
I like music that reminds me of my family and friends.
I miss my dog, but I have a new friend in my cat.
I will go to Comic Con if I can wear my favorite hoodie.
I try to stay active and keep my mind busy to avoid feeling anxious.
I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

participant_2.background:
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
we live in a rural area.
I created a new car design in my head.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! My day has been so busy.
That is great to hear! What have you been up to?
I went running in the morning and then went to work.
Oh wow! That must have been a lot of fun. I love running.
It was! It really helped me clear my mind after a long day at work.
That is great! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! What about you? What have you been up to today?
I've been pretty busy too. I went to Comic Con this morning and then I went to lunch with my family.
Oh wow! That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been to Comic Con before.
It was! It was really cool to see all of the different costumes and characters.
That sounds amazing! I'm so glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I did. What is your favorite thing to do to relax?
I love to bake cakes. I made a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
Oh wow! That is so cool. I love baking too. I'm not very good at it, but it's still fun.
Baking is great! It's so relaxing and you can create something delicious.
I agree! It is very relaxing.
